sentences.english: The market developments of the product are characterized by special uses, enviromental protection, energy-saving and new fields of science and technology.
sentences.chinese: 这对国内无机盐行业的产品市场开发有参考意义。

sentences.english: Inorganic salts were found to promote the allylation reaction of carbonyl compounds with allyl bromide.
sentences.chinese: 研究了无机盐促进的羰基烯丙基化反应。

sentences.english: Catalytic activity of six inorganic salts in the esterification of acetic acid with isoamyl alcohol was studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了六种无机盐在乙酸异戊酯合成中的催化活性。

sentences.english: Refrigeration by means of negative heat of dissolution of inorganic salts is a low consumption cooling method.
sentences.chinese: 采用无机盐的负溶解热制冷是一种低能耗的制冷方法。

sentences.english: These lamellae are made up of collagenous fibers and inorganic salt matrix.
sentences.chinese: 这些骨板由胶原纤维和无机盐组成。

sentences.english: A great quantity of soluble inorganic salt can force the surrounding soil seriously become salinization and alkalinization.
sentences.chinese: 大量可溶性无机盐会加剧周边土壤的盐碱化。

sentences.english: Most inorganic salts ionize in water solution.
sentences.chinese: 大多数无机盐在水溶液中离解。

sentences.english: The intensified food also provides multi-minerals and vitamins.
sentences.chinese: 强化剂补充了多种无机盐和维生素。

sentences.english: Aluminum salt coagulant is the most widely applied inorganic salt coagulant.
sentences.chinese: 铝盐混凝剂是应用最为广泛的无机盐类混凝剂。

sentences.english: A kidney also takes urea and mineral salts out of the blood .
sentences.chinese: 肾还排出血液中的尿素和无机盐。

sentences.english: It is suggested that inorganic salts should be developed as the main anti-caking agents for ammonium nitrate.
sentences.chinese: 建议我国应开发以无机盐为主的硝酸铵防结块剂。
